criteria: Understanding of the relationship between the mean of a sampling distribution and the mean of the population distribution.
Understanding of the relationship between the standard deviation of a sampling distribution and the standard deviation of the population distribution.
Ability to apply knowledge to solve problems.
descriptions: No understanding demonstrated; incorrect or irrelevant response.
Demonstrates minimal understanding; states that the means are related but cannot explain how.
Demonstrates partial understanding; explains that the means are related, but with some inaccuracies or omissions.
Demonstrates satisfactory understanding; explains that the mean of the sampling distribution is equal to the mean of the population distribution.
Demonstrates good understanding; accurately explains the relationship and provides a relevant example.
Demonstrates excellent understanding; clearly and accurately explains the relationship, provides examples, and explains why this relationship holds true.
No understanding demonstrated; incorrect or irrelevant response.
Demonstrates minimal understanding; states that the standard deviations are related but cannot explain how.
Demonstrates partial understanding; explains that the standard deviations are related, but with some inaccuracies or omissions.
Demonstrates satisfactory understanding; explains that the standard deviation of the sampling distribution (standard error) is related to the population standard deviation and the sample size.
Demonstrates good understanding; accurately explains the relationship, including the role of sample size, and provides a relevant example.

Demonstrates excellent understanding; clearly and accurately explains the relationship, including the square root of n, provides examples, and explains the implications of this relationship for statistical inference.
Unable to apply knowledge to solve problems.
Attempts to apply knowledge but makes significant errors.
Applies knowledge with some errors or omissions.
Applies knowledge to solve problems with reasonable accuracy.
Applies knowledge effectively to solve problems accurately.
Applies knowledge expertly to solve complex problems accurately and efficiently.
